Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 20th overall pick, by New York (N) in 1970...
Traded from New York (N) to Chicago (N) on 2/13/1970 (Going to NYM: P J. LaRose. Going to CHC: SS R. Burleson)...
Injured on 4/1/1970 with a Sore Elbow, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 4/14/1970 with a Blister On Finger, out for 5 days...
Traded from Chicago (N) to New York (A) on 4/18/1970 (Going to CHC: 1B J. Pepitone. Going to NYY: SS R. Burleson, LF R. Severson, P D. Downs)...
Traded from New York (A) to Baltimore on 7/7/1971 (Going to NYY: RF R. Gagliano. Going to BAL: 2B R. Burleson)...
Injured on 7/27/1971 with a Strained Elbow Ligament, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 7/23/1972 with a Strained Back, out for one week...
Had first career hit on 4/26/1973, off Al Downing (CHW)...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Chicago (A) on 4/26/1973...
Hit first career homerun on 5/2/1973, off Don Drysdale (CLE)...
Injured on 5/25/1973 with a Tight Elbow, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 4/28/1975 with a Fractured Elbow, out for 8 weeks...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Oakland on 7/31/1975...
Was selected to the 1976 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/12/1977, hitting .469 with 2 HR, 8 RBI...
Was selected to the 1977 Allstar game...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Texas on 7/15/1978...
Was selected to the 1979 Allstar game...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Detroit on 7/23/1979...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Chicago (A) on 9/5/1979...
Won MVP Award in 1979, hitting .349 with 17 HR, 92 RBI...
Injured on 6/10/1980 with a Strained Back Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
